org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler.lnd

Class BaseLNDLightningHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler.lnd.BaseLNDLightningHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LightningHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleBaseLNDLightningHandler

    public abstract class BaseLNDLightningHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements LightningHandler
    Base implementation of LND Lightning Handler handling the methods for generateInvoice, lookupInvoice and invoice subscribing. See SimpleBaseLNDLightningHandler that manages APIs, opening/closing connection. Extends this if custom management of LND APIs should be done, otherwise use SimpleBaseLNDLightningHandler.
    See Also:
    Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-11-24.

      • generateInvoice

        public Invoice generateInvoice(PreImageData preImageData,
                               ConvertedOrder paymentData)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               InternalErrorException
        Method to create an invoice in the underlying LND node.
        Specified by:
        generateInvoice in interface LightningHandler
        Parameters:
        preImageData - the generated pre image and hash to use in invoice.
        paymentData - the payment data to generate invoice for.
        Returns:
        the generated invoice data containing bolt11 invoice etc.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred generating the invoice.

      • lookupInvoice

        public Invoice lookupInvoice(byte[] preImageHash)
                      throws java.io.IOException,
                             InternalErrorException
        Method to lookup an invoice in LND given the invoice's pre-image hash.
        Specified by:
        lookupInvoice in interface LightningHandler
        Parameters:
        preImageHash - the pre image hash of the invoice to lookup.
        Returns:
        related invoice, null if not found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if communication problems occurred with underlying node.
        InternalErrorException - if internal problems occurred communication or parsing invoice with LND node.

      • getNodeInfoFromConfiguration

        protected abstract NodeInfo getNodeInfoFromConfiguration()
                                                  throws InternalErrorException
        Method to retrieve node information from configuration or null if not configured.

        Used when the LND macaroon doesn't have access rights to retrieve LND Node information.

        Returns:
        populated NodeInfo from configuration or nulll if no configuration exists.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if problems occurred parsing the configuration.

      • getSupportedCurrencyCode

        protected abstract java.lang.String getSupportedCurrencyCode()
                                                      throws InternalErrorException
        Method to retrieve configured supported currency code. Should be one of CryptoAmount CURRENCY_CODE_ constants.
        Returns:
        The used currency code
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if currency code configuration was unparsable.
